data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ye, Zhen, Zhou, Yanyan, Bu, Wenjun (2016): Description of a new species of Chimarrhometra Bianchi, 1896 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerridae) from China. Zootaxa 4175 (2): 180-188, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4175.2.6|5 occurrences
